content: Clone actual Radius app from GitHub into /app
Read CONTEXT.md, MIGRATION.md, README.md from cloned repo
Copy backend files (server.py, services/, controllers/, models/, requirements.txt) to /app/backend/
Set up backend/.env with OPENAI_API_KEY and MONGO_URL
Copy frontend files (src/, index.html, vite.config.ts, tsconfig.json, package.json) to /app/frontend/
Install frontend Node dependencies via yarn
Configure supervisord for Vite (port 3000) instead of CRA
Verify both servers running and app accessible
